metadata.title: CVE-2023-29538 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Under specific circumstances a WebExtension may have received ajar:file:/// URI instead of a moz-extension:///URI during a load request. This leaked directory paths on the user'smachine. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox <112, and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
